objects.name: main_scene_text
objects.string: Salut ! Je suis Flavie ! C'est moi qui vais t'accompagner tout au long de ce jeu !

events.comment: a group to keep things tidy
hides non needed stuff and loads the yarn dialogue
sets up variables and starts the dialogue
sets the text to the yarn dialogue when it's scrolling
shows stuff when the text is scrolling and plays the text sound
when "Z" is released it will go to the next dialogue line
hides the options when there is no need to the options
let you select the options up and down
sets the options as the option inputed
